actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend the effective date of the prepaid interest limitations of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 for fiscal year individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1976 to delay for one year, in the case of individuals whose taxable year is a fiscal year, the limitations imposed by such Act on the deduction of prepaid interest by cash basis taxpayers.

titles.title: A bill to extend the effective date of the prepaid interest limitations of the Tax Reform Act of 1976 for fiscal year individuals.
